attributes.action: Allow Jamaican's and british born jamaican children to have a Uk passport
attributes.additional_details: Allow Jamaican and british born Jamaican children have a UK passport. I don't think it fair that my own Jamaican family and friends and other families get deported. Has when a person is deported they are leaving behind close family and children of there own and its not out of choice as the government set the deporting problems. if I'm right Jamaica saved UK in WW1 in history!
